var HOST = 'http://firstnethackathon.herokuapp.com/' var ws = new WebSocket(HOST); var el = document.getElementById('server-time'); var Gpio = require('onoff').Gpio; //include onoff to interact with the GPIO var LED = new Gpio(4, 'out'); ws.onmessage = function (event) { if (LED.readSync() === 0) { //check the pin state, if the state is 0 (or off) LED.writeSync(1); //set pin state to 1 (turn LED on) } else { LED.writeSync(0); //set pin state to 0 (turn LED off) } }; ​

​
